title: MySql数据库问题
txt_content:
null
com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: The last packet successfully received from the server was 3,617,915 milliseconds ago.  The last packet sent successfully to the server was 3,617,920 milliseconds ago. is longer than the server configured value of 'wait_timeout'. You should consider either expiring and/or testing connection validity before use in your application, increasing the server configured values for client timeouts, or using the Connector/J connection property 'autoReconnect=true' to avoid this problem.

求解!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.author: aibai
replies.txt_content: MySQL连接超时, 可以试试在连接上加autoReconnect=true参数

baibai 发表于 2020-1-11 23:29
MySQL连接超时, 可以试试在连接上加autoReconnect=true参数
不会呀QAQ

replies.author: Himmelt
replies.txt_content: 查看一下你的数据库是否能正常打开。可以用数据库软件查看一下。

Himmelt 发表于 2020-1-12 10:33
查看一下你的数据库是否能正常打开。可以用数据库软件查看一下。
已经修好了,

98976431 发表于 2020-1-12 10:53
